title: Vk_library options
description: Options for using the vk_library library to avoid specifying parameters in the source code.

token.description:
Token for accessing the VK API. It is recommended to get a token from KateModile if you are using a user api.
You can get the token here - https://vkhost.github.io/

language.description: Determines the language in which various data will be returned, for example, the names of countries and cities.

version.description: The version of the API to use. Using this parameter applies some changes to the response format of the various methods.
